school rules : darin simak 's parents say he should n't be punished for doing the right thing , while the school district says bringing a fake weapon to school violates policy at the highest level . summary: darin simak , a first-grader , has been suspended from school for bringing a toy gun to class .   the seven-year-old did n't realize it was in the bag his mother packed for him and handed it in as soon as he saw it .   he was suspended because bringing a fake weapon to school violates the school district 's policy .   darin 's parents say he did the right thing by handing it in and should n't be punished for it .
